org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE follows.blocked = "$1" AND follows.follower_id = "$2" AND follows.follower_type = "$3" AND follows.followable_id = "$4" AND follows.followable_type = "$5"

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE follows.blocked = "$1" AND follows.follower_id = "$2" AND follows.follower_type = "$3" AND follows.followable_id = "$4" AND follows.followable_type = "$5" LIMIT 1
